Osejs.Information.Title: Coin
Osejs.Information.Abstract: A spinning disk is gently placed on a rough horizontal surface. Initially there will be sliding, but gradually the center of mass accelerates. The simulation will display the velocity filed in the disk perimeter and, optionally, the time evolution of the angular velocity and the velocities of the center and the contact point.
Osejs.Information.Author: Juan M. Aguirregabiria (http://tp.lc.ehu.es/jma.html)

Variable.Name: x0
Variable.Comment: Initial value for the x coordinate of the center-of-mass

Variable.Name: graphics
Variable.Comment: Show time evolution in separate window

Content.Comment: Cylinder is always on the platform

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: Use mouse to change coin position
Number of points in velocity field
Show evolution of velocities in another window
